Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;beer^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 哇！现在你可以制作属于你自己的啤酒了，你离完美的生活又近了一步！
Texts.Eng: Cheers! Now that you can make your own beer, your life is one step closer to perfection.

It's ^blue;beer time^reset;! Go to your ^orange;Fermenter^reset; to make 3 ^green;Beer^reset;. You'll need 1 ^orange;Wort^reset;, 2 ^orange;Hops^reset;, 2 ^orange;Wheat^reset;, 1 ^orange;Yeast Water^reset; and 1 ^orange;Empty Bottle^reset;.
